scripts.deploy:dev: dotnet lambda deploy-function --function-name Flyingdarts-Backend-Friends-Api-Development  -frun dotnet8 -f net8.0 --region eu-west-1
scripts.deploy:prod: dotnet lambda deploy-function --function-name Flyingdarts-Backend-Friends-Api-Production  -frun dotnet8 -f net8.0 --region eu-west-1
